article:
'PDB' is a container format for record databases in Palm OS, Garnet OS and
Access Linux Platform. Its structure is similar to PRC resource databases. N. Rhodes, J. McKeehan. Palm OS Programming, Second Edition,
O'Reilly, 2001, ISBN 1-56592-856-3 The PalmDOC eBook format is a special
version of the PDB format. MobileRead Wiki:
[http://wiki.mobileread.com/wiki/PalmDOC Specification of the PalmDOC
format]
